feed.title: Google Cloud: Access Transparency
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Access Transparency

entry.content: Access Transparency supports Firebase Data Connect in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Transparency now supports Firebase Data Connect in Google Cloud.
entry.title: Feature: Access Transparency for Firebase Data Connect

entry.content: Access Transparency supports Firebase Data Connect in the Preview stage.
entry.summary: Access Transparency now supports Firebase Data Connect in preview.
entry.title: Feature: Access Transparency now supports Firebase Data Connect

entry.content: Access Transparency supports BigQuery data preparation in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Transparency now supports BigQuery data preparation in general availability. This feature enhances security and compliance by providing visibility into data access.
entry.title: Feature: Access Transparency for BigQuery
